name: Sweet Potato and Apple Casserole
author: Tamby Plue
summary: This wonderful sweet potato recipe tastes like a dessert. It's always a favorite.
ingredients: ½ cup firmly packed brown sugar
2 large cooking apples - peeled, cored and cut into 1/4 inch rings
¼ cup firmly packed brown sugar
directions: Place sweet potatoes in a large saucepan with enough water to cover
Bring to a boil and cook 25 minutes, or until tender but firm
Drain, cool and cut into 1/4 inch slices
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 7x11 inch baking dish
In a small bowl, mix brown sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg
Layer sweet potatoes, brown sugar mixture and apples in the prepared baking dish
In a medium bowl, mix flour, brown sugar, butter and pecans
Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until lightly browned
